short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give you a clean reddit with no promoted posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReBlock is a user-friendly tool designed to enhance your Reddit experience by effectively blocking both promoted posts and video promoted posts. Say goodbye to intrusive ads and enjoy a cleaner, more engaging feed tailored to your interests.

We really hope you enjoy it!
